edu.usc.pgroup.goffish.gofs

Interface ISliceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SliceManager

    public interface ISliceManager
    This interface represents a object capable of writing and reading partitions and their associated instance data. Each slice manager is responsible for only a single partition.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deletePartition()
      Completely deletes any stored information for this partition.
      Iterable<? extends ISubgraphInstance> readInstances(ISubgraph subgraph, long startTime, long endTime, PropertySet vertexProperties, PropertySet edgeProperties)
      Returns an iterable that will load instances that fit the query on demand.
      IPartition readPartition()
      Reads and returns the partition this manager is responsible for.
      ISubgraph readSubgraph(long subgraphId)
      Reads and returns a single subgraph from the partition this manager is responsible for with the given id.
      int writeInstances(ISerializablePartition partition)
      Writes the instance data of the given partition, no template data is written.
      int writeTemplate(IPartition partition)
      Writes the template data of the given partition, no instance information is written.

                         throws IOException

      • readSubgraph

        ISubgraph readSubgraph(long subgraphId)
                       throws IOException
        Reads and returns a single subgraph from the partition this manager is responsible for with the given id.
        Parameters:
        subgraphId - the id of the subgraph to return
        Returns:
        a single subgraph from this partition
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readInstances

        Iterable<? extends ISubgraphInstance> readInstances(ISubgraph subgraph,
                                                  long startTime,
                                                  long endTime,
                                                  PropertySet vertexProperties,
                                                  PropertySet edgeProperties)
                                                    throws IOException
        Returns an iterable that will load instances that fit the query on demand. The given timespan is evaluated with respect to the start time of each instance.
        Parameters:
        subgraph - the subgraph to retrieve instances for
        startTime - the earliest time to retrieve instances for
        endTime - the latest time to retrieve instances for
        vertexProperties - the properties to retrieve for vertices
        edgeProperties - the properties to retrieve for edges
        Returns:
        An iterable which will return instances matching the query, loaded on demand
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeTemplate

        int writeTemplate(IPartition partition)
                  throws IOException
        Writes the template data of the given partition, no instance information is written. The partition id must match any previous id, and any previous information will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        partition - the partition to write
        Returns:
        the number of bytes written
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeInstances

        int writeInstances(ISerializablePartition partition)
                   throws IOException
        Writes the instance data of the given partition, no template data is written. The partition id must match any previosu id, and any previous information will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        partition - The partition to write
        Returns:
        the number of bytes written
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deletePartition

        void deletePartition()
        Completely deletes any stored information for this partition.
